TopicTitle: You don't forget your chute, so don't forget your KSP gifts

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1fUQQjy"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e45f77161f474abe2973dcf789a11c0c/tumblr_inline_nh0h4gzH3E1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>Giving the gift of KSP is sure to put others in orbit!<br/><br/>Kerbal Space Program is going for 25% off on <a href="http://bit.ly/1fUQQjy"><strong>STEAM</strong></a>. The <a href="http://bit.ly/1FJ97co"><strong>SHAPEWAYS</strong></a> KSP 3D prints are among some of their biggest items and of course, we’ve got our own <a href="http://bit.ly/1sS0h4h"><strong>CAFEPRESS</strong></a> shop. <br/><br/>All feature plenty of ways to spread the joy of science and fiery hijinks, wrapped up in green.<br/><br/>Make sure you’re good, too. jeffmcdowalldesign’s Kerbal on a shelf is watching!</p>

I think the Kerbal on a shelf would. He's on a shelf in one of my ships.

He'd know very well...

Back on track:

'Tis a pity none of my friends like KSP.
I'm thinking of getting myself some Kerbal Christmas gifts this year. I'm not sure who else would do it for me... I need better friends
Well, since I forget to pack parachutes, I would forget these gifts too...

Well I don't know if I can get any gifts for my kerbal IRL friends, but I've got a little Christmas forum gift open in video studio right now. I hope you all enjoy it when It's completed .

EDIT: Video is up

. Edited December 23, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
Yesterday I bought KSP on Steam for one of my IRL friends. Hopefully, he'll like it.

Can we get an actual Jeb on a shelf? I would buy it in a heart beat and I know my son would LOVE it (he is almost 7).

-"You better be nice or Jeb is going to tell Santa Klaus that you don't need moar boosters for Christmas"

Can we get an actual Jeb on a shelf? I would buy it in a heart beat and I know my son would LOVE it (he is almost 7).

-"You better be nice or Jeb is going to tell Santa Klaus that you don't need moar boosters for Christmas"

These might be what you're looking for.
What!? Jeb said he wouldn't tell anyone about that time I forgot to pack him a chute! I'll show him. When I get home, I'm taking all the parachutes back!
